description: karlandrefilms is a student-led initiative at the intersection of digital filmmaking, photography, and artificial intelligence. The project uses open-source tools to explore new forms of creative storytelling, while contributing insights and resources back to the open-source community. The goal is to enable accessible, AI-powered multimedia production and to promote experimentation and innovation through shared knowledge.

needs.description: A high-performance PC for video editing, AI model training, and multimedia rendering.
Licenses and cloud access for open-source AI tools and creative development environments.
Funding for a student-led research project on the use of AI in creative media production.
